title: Optical nanoscopy turns coherent
title_cn: 光学纳米显微镜变得连贯

title: Far-field nanoscopy on a semiconductor quantum dot via a rapid-adiabatic-passage-based switch
title_cn: 通过基于快速绝热通道的开关对半导体量子点进行远场纳米检查
abstract: The diffraction limit prevents a conventional optical microscope from imaging at the nanoscale. However, nanoscale imaging of molecules is possible by exploiting an intensity-dependent molecular switch. This switch is translated into a microscopy scheme, stimulated emission depletion microscopy. Variants on this scheme exist, yet all exploit an incoherent response to the lasers. We present a scheme that relies on a coherent response to a laser. Quantum control of a two-level system proceeds via rapid adiabatic passage, an ideal molecular switch. We implement this scheme on an ensemble of quantum dots. Each quantum dot results in a bright spot in the image with extent down to 30 nm (λ/31). There is no significant loss of intensity with respect to confocal microscopy, resulting in a factor of 10 improvement in emitter position determination. The experiments establish rapid adiabatic passage as a versatile tool in the super-resolution toolbox.
abstract_cn: 衍射极限阻止了常规光学显微镜在纳米级成像。 但是，通过利用强度依赖的分子开关，可以对分子进行纳米级成像。 此开关转换为显微镜方案，即受激发射损耗显微镜。 存在该方案的变体，但是所有方案都利用了对激光的非相干响应。 我们提出了一种依赖于对激光的相干响应的方案。 通过快速绝热通道（理想的分子开关）进行两级系统的量子控制。 我们在量子点的整体上实施该方案。 每个量子点都会在图像中产生一个亮点，范围缩小到30纳米（＆＃955; / 31）。 相对于共聚焦显微镜没有明显的强度损失，导致发射极位置确定提高了10倍。 实验建立了快速绝热通道，将其作为超分辨率工具箱中的多功能工具。</ p>

title: Large magneto-optical Kerr effect and imaging of magnetic octupole domains in an antiferromagnetic metal
title_cn: 大铁磁克尔效应和反铁磁金属中八极磁畴的成像
abstract: The magneto-optical Kerr effect (MOKE) has been intensively studied in a variety of ferro- and ferrimagnetic materials as a powerful probe for electronic and magnetic properties and for magneto-optical technologies. The MOKE can be additionally useful for the investigation of the antiferromagnetic (AF) state, although thus far limited to insulators. Here, we report the first observation of the MOKE in an AF metal. In particular, we find that the non-collinear AF metal Mn3Sn (ref. ) exhibits a large zero-field Kerr rotation angle of 20 mdeg at room temperature, comparable to ferromagnetic metals. Our first-principles calculations clarify that ferroic ordering of magnetic octupoles produces a large MOKE even in its fully compensated AF state. This large MOKE further allows imaging of the magnetic octupole domains and their reversal. The observation of a large MOKE in an AF metal will open new avenues for the study of domain dynamics as well as spintronics using antiferromagnets.
abstract_cn: 磁光克尔效应（MOKE）已在各种铁磁材料和铁磁材料中得到了深入研究，作为电子和磁学性质以及磁光技术的有力探针。 MOKE还可用于研究反铁磁（AF）状态，尽管到目前为止还仅限于绝缘体。在这里，我们报告在AF金属中对MOKE的首次观察。特别是，我们发现非共线AF金属Mn 3 Sn（参考）在室温下表现出与铁磁金属相当的零场Kerr旋转角，为20 mdeg。我们的第一性原理计算表明，即使在完全补偿的AF状态下，磁性八极的铁素体排序也会产生较大的MOKE。较大的MOKE还可以使八极磁畴成像并对其进行反转。在AF金属中观察到大的MOKE，将为研究域动力学以及使用反铁磁体的自旋电子学开辟新的途径。

title: Large optical nonlinearity of nanoantennas coupled to an epsilon-near-zero material
title_cn: 纳米天线的大光学非线性耦合到ε近零的材料
abstract: The size and operating energy of a nonlinear optical device are fundamentally constrained by the weakness of the nonlinear optical response of common materials. Here, we report that a 50-nm-thick optical metasurface made of optical dipole antennas coupled to an epsilon-near-zero material exhibits a broadband (∼400 nm bandwidth) and ultrafast (recovery time less than 1 ps) intensity-dependent refractive index n2 as large as −3.73 ± 0.56 cm2 GW−1. Furthermore, the metasurface exhibits a maximum optically induced refractive index change of ±2.5 over a spectral range of ∼200 nm. The inclusion of low-Q nanoantennas on an epsilon-near-zero thin film not only allows the design of a metasurface with an unprecedentedly large nonlinear optical response, but also offers the flexibility to tailor the sign of the response. Our technique removes a longstanding obstacle in nonlinear optics: the lack of materials with an ultrafast nonlinear contribution to refractive index on the order of unity. It consequently offers the possibility to design low-power nonlinear nano-optical devices with orders-of-magnitude smaller footprints.
abstract_cn: 非线性光学器件的尺寸和工作能量从根本上受到普通材料非线性光学响应弱点的限制。在这里，我们报告说，由光学偶极子天线和epsilon-near-zero-零材料耦合制成的50 nm厚的光学超表面具有宽带（＆＃8764; 400＆＃8201; nm带宽）和超快的性能（恢复时间小于1 ps）与强度有关的折射率n 2 高达＆＃8722; 3.73＆＃8201;＆＃177;＆＃8201; 0.56＆＃8201; cm 2 ＆＃8201; GW ＆＃8722; 1 。此外，超颖表面在＆＃8764; 200＆＃8201; nm的光谱范围内表现出最大的光学诱导的折射率变化为＆＃177; 2.5。在接近零的ε薄膜上包含低Q纳米天线，不仅可以设计出具有前所未有的大非线性光学响应的​​超颖表面，而且还可以灵活地定制响应的信号。我们的技术消除了非线性光学中一个长期存在的障碍：缺乏对折射率的超快非线性贡献达到统一的材料。因此，它有可能设计出占位面积较小的低功率非线性纳米光学器件。

title: Wavefront shaping with disorder-engineered metasurfaces
title_cn: 具有无序工程超表面的波阵面整形
abstract: Recently, wavefront shaping with disordered media has demonstrated optical manipulation capabilities beyond those of conventional optics, including extended volume, aberration-free focusing and subwavelength focusing. However, translating these capabilities to useful applications has remained challenging as the input–output characteristics of the disordered media (P variables) need to be exhaustively determined via O(P) measurements. Here, we propose a paradigm shift where the disorder is specifically designed so its exact input–output characteristics are known a priori and can be used with only a few alignment steps. We implement this concept with a disorder-engineered metasurface, which exhibits additional unique features for wavefront shaping such as a large optical memory effect range in combination with a wide angular scattering range, excellent stability, and a tailorable angular scattering profile. Using this designed metasurface with wavefront shaping, we demonstrate high numerical aperture (NA > 0.5) focusing and fluorescence imaging with an estimated ~2.2 × 108 addressable points in an ~8 mm field of view.
abstract_cn: 最近，无序介质的波前整形已经证明了超越传统光学器件的光学操纵能力，包括扩展的体积，无像差聚焦和亚波长聚焦。但是，将这些功能转换为有用的应用程序仍然很困难，因为需要通过O（P）测量来彻底确定无序媒体的输入输出特性（P变量）。在这里，我们提出了一种范式转换，其中对疾病进行了专门设计，因此其确切的输入输出特性是先验已知的，并且仅需几个对齐步骤即可使用。我们用无序设计的超表面来实现此概念，该超表面具有波前成形的其他独特功能，例如较大的光学记忆效应范围以及较宽的角度散射范围，出色的稳定性和可定制的角度散射轮廓。使用具有波前成形的这种设计的超表面，我们展示了高数值孔径（NA＆＃8201;＆＃8201; 0.5）聚焦和荧光成像，估计约为2.2＆＃8201;＆＃2151; 10 8 个可寻址点。

title: Time-reversal symmetry breaking with acoustic pumping of nanophotonic circuits
title_cn: 纳米光子电路的声泵浦打破时间反转对称性
abstract: Achieving non-reciprocal light propagation via stimuli that break time-reversal symmetry, without magneto-optics, remains a major challenge for integrated nanophotonic devices. Recently, optomechanical microsystems in which light and vibrational modes are coupled through ponderomotive forces have demonstrated strong non-reciprocal effects through a variety of techniques, but always using optical pumping. None of these approaches has demonstrated bandwidth exceeding that of the mechanical system, and all of them require optical power; these are both fundamental and practical issues. Here, we resolve both challenges by breaking time-reversal symmetry using a two-dimensional acoustic pump that simultaneously provides a non-zero overlap integral for light–sound interaction and also satisfies the necessary phase-matching. We use this technique to produce a non-reciprocal modulator (a frequency shifting isolator) by means of indirect interband scattering. We demonstrate mode conversion asymmetry up to 15 dB and efficiency as high as 17% over a bandwidth exceeding 1 GHz.
abstract_cn: 在没有磁光的情况下，通过打破时间反转对称性的刺激来实现不可逆的光传播仍然是集成纳米光子器件的主要挑战。近来，通过光动力耦合光和振动模式的光机械微系统已经通过多种技术表现出强大的不可逆作用，但始终使用光泵浦。这些方法中没有一个显示出超过机械系统带宽的带宽，并且所有这些都需要光功率。这些都是基本和实际问题。在这里，我们通过使用二维声泵打破时间反转对称性来解决这两个挑战，该声泵同时为光声相互作用提供非零重叠积分，并且还满足必要的相位匹配。我们使用这种技术通过间接的带间散射产生一个不可逆的调制器（移频隔离器）。我们演示了在超过1＆＃8201; GHz的带宽上，模式转换不对称性高达15＆＃8201; dB，效率高达17％。

title: High-efficiency electroluminescence and amplified spontaneous emission from a thermally activated delayed fluorescent near-infrared emitter
title_cn: 高效电致发光和热激活延迟荧光近红外发射器的放大自发发射
abstract: Near-infrared organic light-emitting diodes and semiconductor lasers could benefit a variety of applications including night-vision displays, sensors and information-secured displays. Organic dyes can generate electroluminescence efficiently at visible wavelengths, but organic light-emitting diodes are still underperforming in the near-infrared region. Here, we report thermally activated delayed fluorescent organic light-emitting diodes that operate at near-infrared wavelengths with a maximum external quantum efficiency of nearly 10% using a boron difluoride curcuminoid derivative. As well as an effective upconversion from triplet to singlet excited states due to the non-adiabatic coupling effect, this donor–acceptor–donor compound also exhibits efficient amplified spontaneous emission. By controlling the polarity of the active medium, the maximum emission wavelength of the electroluminescence spectrum can be tuned from 700 to 780 nm. This study represents an important advance in near-infrared organic light-emitting diodes and the design of alternative molecular architectures for photonic applications based on thermally activated delayed fluorescence.
abstract_cn: 近红外有机发光二极管和半导体激光器可以使包括夜视显示器，传感器和信息安全显示器在内的各种应用受益。有机染料可以在可见波长处有效地产生电致发光，但是有机发光二极管在近红外区域的性能仍然不佳。在这里，我们报告了使用二氟化硼姜黄素衍生物在近红外波长工作的热激活延迟荧光有机发光二极管，其最大外部量子效率接近10％。由于非绝热偶合效应，从三重激发态到单重激发态的有效上转换，该供体受体也显示出有效的放大自发发射。通过控制活性介质的极性，可以将电致发光光谱的最大发射波长从700调整到780＆＃8201; nm。这项研究代表了近红外有机发光二极管的重要进展，以及基于热激活延迟荧光的光子应用替代分子体系结构的设计。

title: Tandem luminescent solar concentrators based on engineered quantum dots
title_cn: 基于工程量子点的串联发光太阳能聚光器
abstract: Luminescent solar concentrators (LSCs) can serve as large-area sunlight collectors for terrestrial and space-based photovoltaics. Due to their high emission efficiencies and readily tunable emission and absorption spectra, colloidal quantum dots have emerged as a new and promising type of LSC fluorophore. Spectral tunability of the quantum dots also facilitates the realization of stacked multilayered LSCs, where enhanced performance is obtained through spectral splitting of incident sunlight, as in multijunction photovoltaics. Here, we demonstrate a large-area (>230 cm2) tandem LSC based on two types of nearly reabsorption-free quantum dots spectrally tuned for optimal solar-spectrum splitting. This prototype device exhibits a high optical quantum efficiency of 6.4% for sunlight illumination and solar-to-electrical power conversion efficiency of 3.1%. The efficiency gains due to the tandem architecture over single-layer devices quickly increase with increasing LSC size and can reach more than 100% in structures with window sizes of more than 2,500 cm2.
abstract_cn: 发光太阳能聚光器（LSC）可以用作地面和太空光伏系统的大面积阳光收集器。由于它们的高发射效率以及易于调节的发射和吸收光谱，胶体量子点已经成为一种新的有希望的LSC荧光团类型。量子点的光谱可调谐性还有助于实现堆叠的多层LSC，如在多结光伏电池中一样，通过入射太阳光的光谱分裂获得增强的性能。在这里，我们展示了一种大面积（> 230＆＃8201; cm 2 ）串联LSC，它基于两种类型的几乎无重吸收的量子点，这些量子点经过光谱调整以优化太阳光谱的分裂。该原型设备在日光照射下显示出6.4％的高光量子效率，在3.1％的太阳能到电功率转换效率中表现出出色的光学量子效率。随着LSC尺寸的增加，单层设备上的串联架构所带来的效率提高迅速增加，并且在窗口尺寸超过2500＆＃8201; cm 2 的结构中可以达到100％以上。 / p>

title: High-speed optical coherence tomography by circular interferometric ranging
title_cn: 圆形干涉测距的高速光学相干断层扫描
abstract: Existing three-dimensional optical imaging methods excel in controlled environments, but are difficult to deploy over large, irregular and dynamic fields. This means that they can be ill-suited for use in areas such as material inspection and medicine. To better address these applications, we developed methods in optical coherence tomography to efficiently interrogate sparse scattering fields, that is, those in which most locations (voxels) do not generate meaningful signal. Frequency comb sources are used to superimpose reflected signals from equispaced locations through optical subsampling. This results in circular ranging, and reduces the number of measurements required to interrogate large volumetric fields. As a result, signal acquisition barriers that have limited speed and field in optical coherence tomography are avoided. With a new ultrafast, time-stretched frequency comb laser design operating with 7.6 MHz to 18.9 MHz repetition rates, we achieved imaging of multi-cm3 fields at up to 7.5 volumes per second.
abstract_cn: 现有的三维光学成像方法在受控环境中表现出色，但很难在大型，不规则和动态场中部署。这意味着它们可能不适用于材料检查和医学等领域。为了更好地解决这些应用，我们开发了光学相干层析成像方法来有效询问稀疏散射场，即那些在大多数位置（体素）不产生有意义信号的场。频率梳源用于通过光学子采样叠加来自等距位置的反射信号。这导致了循环测距，并减少了询问大体积场所需的测量次数。结果，避免了在光学相干层析成像中具有有限的速度和场的信号采集屏障。通过以7.6＆＃8201MHz至18.9＆＃8201; MHz重复频率运行的新型超快，时间拉伸频率梳状激光器设计，我们实现了高达7.5的多cm 3 场成像每秒的音量。
